# MDX Simple Test

This is a simple MDX file with JSX elements.

export const items = ['red', 'green', 'blue'];

<div class="colors">
  {items.map(color => <span style={`color: ${color}`}>{color}</span>)}
</div>

## List Test

<ul>
  <li>First item</li>
  <li>Second item</li>
  <li>Third item</li>
</ul>
